title: 32(1)(b) of the Finance Act 2015 (No. 52 of 2015) is deemed to have come into
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Finance Act 2015 (Section 32(1)(b))
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Finance Act 2015 (Section 32(1)(b)) 

(Commencement) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited finance act 2015 (section 32(1)(b)) (commencement) order 2025

title: 32(1)(b) of the Finance Act 2015 (No. 52 of 2015) is deemed to have come into
heading: 2. The 19th day of May 2017 is appointed as the day on which section
text_raw:
2. The 19th day of May 2017 is appointed as the day on which section 
32(1)(b) of the Finance Act 2015 (No. 52 of 2015) is deemed to have come into 
operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

28 April, 2025. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 2nd May, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [155] 3

ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
